# letterpressStyle

**Type Property**

A graphical text effect that gives glyphs the appearance of letterpress printing, which involves pressing the type into the paper.

## Declaration

```swift
static let letterpressStyle: NSAttributedString.TextEffectStyle
```
title: letterpressStyle
